roleset_name: fill, attach, or fix with gum or gum-like substance

roles.descr: First (or all in one constituent) thing gummed
roles.descr_trans: 第一个（或全部在一个组成部分中）涂胶的东西

roles.descr: Thing arg1 is attached to with gum (when separate constituent)
roles.descr_trans: 东西 arg1 用口香糖附着（当单独的成分时）

roles.descr: Gum itself, type of gum used, instrument
roles.descr_trans: 口香糖本身、所用口香糖类型、仪器

roleset_name_trans: 用口香糖或口香糖类物质填充、附着或固定

roleset_name: make sticky, metaphorically make a sticky situation
roleset_name_trans: 使粘性，比喻使情况变得粘性
